Shake the Earth.name: Shake the Earth
Shake the Earth.fullText:
Earth Shaker Attack 11Shake the Earth

Your attack emits a pulse of thunder that strikes around obstacles and can wrench burrowing creatures from the ground.

Encounter        Primal, Thunder, Weapon
Standard Action      Close burst 4

Target: Each enemy in the burst

  Special: Solid obstacles do not block line of effect for the burst.

Attack: Strength vs. Fortitude

Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier thunder damage. If the target is burrowing, you slide it 4 squares to the square nearest to it that is within your line of effect.


Published in Primal Power, page(s) 108.
Shake the Earth.flavor: Your attack emits a pulse of thunder that strikes around obstacles and can wrench burrowing creatures from the ground.
Shake the Earth.special: Solid obstacles do not block line of effect for the burst.
Shake the Earth.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier thunder damage. If the target is burrowing, you slide it 4 squares to the square nearest to it that is within your line of effect.

Form of the Primeval Bulette.name: Form of the Primeval Bulette
Form of the Primeval Bulette.fullText:
Earth Shaker Attack 20Form of the Primeval Bulette

You take on the armored form of the monstrous bulette, granting you increased vitality and allowing you to burrow through the earth.

Daily        Healing, Polymorph, Primal
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: You assume the guardian form of the primeval bulette until the end of the encounter. While you are in this form, you gain a burrow speed equal to your speed and a +3 bonus to Fortitude. In addition, whenever you spend a healing surge, you regain 20 additional hit points.
Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the Primeval Bulette Attack power while you are in this form.


Form of the Primeval Bulette Attack

You take on the armored form of the monstrous bulette, granting you increased vitality and allowing you to burrow through the earth.

Encounter      Healing, Polymorph, Primal
Standard Action      Close burst 2

Effect: Before the attack, you burrow your speed. You must burrow at least 2 squares.

Target: Each creature in the burst

Attack: Strength + 4 vs. Fortitude
Level 26: Strength + 6 vs. Fortitude

Hit: 3d8 + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone. If the target is already prone, it takes ongoing 5 damage (save ends).

Miss: Half damage, and you knock the target prone.

Requirement: The power Form of the Primeval Bulette must be active in order to use this power.


Published in Primal Power, page(s) 108.
Form of the Primeval Bulette.flavor: You take on the armored form of the monstrous bulette, granting you increased vitality and allowing you to burrow through the earth.

Strength + 4 vs. Fortitude
Level 26: Strength + 6 vs. Fortitude

Tread the Earth.name: Tread the Earth
Tread the Earth.fullText:
Earth Shaker Utility 12Tread the Earth

You dive within the earth and move through it quickly, gaining advantage over unsuspecting enemies.

Encounter        Primal
Move Action      Personal

Effect: You burrow twice your speed. Each enemy adjacent to you at the end of your move grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.


Published in Primal Power, page(s) 108.
Tread the Earth.flavor: You dive within the earth and move through it quickly, gaining advantage over unsuspecting enemies.
Tread the Earth.effect: You burrow twice your speed. Each enemy adjacent to you at the end of your move grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.
